title: Off-Grid Watering System I  Solar Powered Farm Irrigation I Solar Water Pump for Garden

tasks.task: Transferring water from the tote to garden beds using a solar-powered pumping system
subtasks: Setting up the solar charging system
Wiring the solar panel to the charge controller
Connecting the charge controller to the battery
Attaching the filter to the inlet pump
Connecting the outlet hose to the pump
Operating the pump to transfer water from the tote to the garden beds
